comment: It is increasingly clear that Feinstein and Schumer were sure Kavanaugh would drop out after the story leaked. They never planned for the old dinbat to testify and they never expected Kavanaugh to go Gladiator on them Once again, the lesson is you always punch back twice as hard.

      :snt3 (l2 / lesson

                                    :quant 2)))
